alert.note: Alert for Florence (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 10:58PM EDT until September 04 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina...South Carolina... Northeast Cape Fear River Near Burgaw affecting Pender County. Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. Lumber River 1 SE Nichols affecting Horry, Dillon and Marion Counties. Lynches River At Effingham affecting Florence County. For the Northeast Cape Fear River...including Burgaw...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Lumber River...including Nichols, Pembroke, Lumberton Usgs Gage, Maxton, Lumberton, Boardman...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Lynches River...including Effingham...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lynches River at Effingham. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flood waters will affect several homes along the river and isolate those residents without boats. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 3.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 15.9 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Thursday afternoon.
